author: Pamela Muse
text:
An Alliance member is looking at out-sourcing 4 department/division services.  It would be very helpful if you would share you RFPs and contracts for outsourcing these services - or any other departments:  

Park/Trail/Field Maintenance
Facility Maintenance
Fleet Maintenance
Jail Operations

Your time and expertise are appreciated!
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
888-468-6450
pmuse@transformgov.org
www.transformgov.org
title: Out-sourcing Parks, Facilities, Fleet & Jail Services
